footer.newsletterText: Subscribe to receive information about new products and special offers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and policies.
faq.noResultsText: Try a different search term or browse the categories below.
faq.tryDifferent: Try a different search term or browse the categories below.
faq.contactText: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please contact our customer support team.

questions.orderTracking: How can I track my order?
questions.productQuality: What is the quality of your pet products?
questions.passwordReset: How can I reset my password?
questions.petFoodIngredients: What ingredients are in your pet food?
questions.damagedProducts: What should I do if a damaged product arrives?

answers.orderTracking: To track your order, log in to your account and go to the 'Orders' section. There you can find tracking information for your recent purchases. Alternatively, you can use the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.
answers.deliveryTime: Delivery time varies depending on your location. Standard local delivery usually takes 3-5 business days. Express delivery happens within 1-2 business days. International shipping can take 7-14 business days depending on the destination country and customs procedures.
answers.productQuality: We take pride in offering only high-quality pet products. All our products undergo strict quality control and are sourced from reliable manufacturers. We choose sustainable, pet-safe materials and regularly test our products to ensure they meet quality, safety, and durability standards.
answers.returnPolicy: Unused products can be returned in original packaging within 30 days of receipt. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund or exchange. Note that shipping costs for returned products are not refunded unless the product was defective or incorrectly sent.
answers.passwordReset: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page. Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.
answers.orderCancellation: Yes, you can cancel your order if it hasn't been shipped yet. To do this, log into your account, find the relevant order in the 'Orders' section, and click the 'Cancel Order' button. If the order has already been shipped, you'll need to wait for it to arrive and then initiate the return process.
answers.internationalShipping: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries. International shipping rates are calculated based on destination, weight, and package dimensions. Note that additional duties, taxes, or fees may apply according to your country's customs requirements and are the customer's responsibility.
answers.petFoodIngredients: Our pet foods are made with high-quality, natural ingredients and contain no artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors. We use high-quality proteins, whole grains, and fresh vegetables. Detailed ingredient information is provided on each product page. If your pet has allergies or special dietary needs, please check the ingredients carefully or contact us.
answers.damagedProducts: If your product arrives damaged, take pictures of the damage and contact our customer service within 48 hours of receiving your package. We will send you a replacement as soon as possible or issue a refund. Keep the original packaging until the issue is resolved.
